summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4502 for the improvement of Broad Street, from 1st Avenue to 5th Avenue North; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading, regrading, paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 52829, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
